title: Paris ni Saku Etoile

alternative_titles.ja: パリに咲くエトワール

synopsis: In the early 1900s, two Japanese girls—Fujiko, who dreams of becoming a painter, and Chizuru, who is passionate about ballet—refuse to give up and reach for the stars (Etoile) even in difficult times. After meeting by chance in Yokohama, they reunite in Paris, where they strive to pursue their dreams together.
